properties.name: filescanner
properties.description: Configuration for the FileScanner Watame plugin

properties.name: filescanner.common-pool
properties.description: Should the file scanner use the common thread pool (default: true)

properties.name: filescanner.workers
properties.description: If NOT using the common pool, how many worker threads should be used (default: 2 | max: 10)

properties.name: filescanner.qt-transformer
properties.description: Path to the QuickTime-FastStart library. (default: windows = qt-faststart-x86.exe | linux = qtfs
